name: 4SightLite - Lateral Thinking Word Challenge Game
description:
Welcome to 4SightLite, the new fun word game to test your word skills, creativity and lateral thinking.

It is very simple; you are shown three clue words, for example:
blue • Swiss • cake
You have to find a fourth word common to all three clue words.
Type in your answer and tap the 'check' button. If you answer is correct, then ‘correct!!’ appears, and the chameleon will eat a fly! Three new clue words then appear automatically. If you answer is incorrect, ‘try again…’ appears.
An answer word can come before or after a clue word. It might be a separate word, a hyphenated word, or a part of a larger word.
In this example the answer is ‘cheese’ – blue cheese, Swiss cheese, cheesecake.

Think it sounds easy? Then KarmeleonStudio challenges you!
But a warning: once you start it’s hard to stop…
MAIN FEATURES
• 4SightLite contains clue words for 30 answers (1 wordset)
• Five levels of difficulty: Simple, Easy, Moderate, Tough, Extreme
• New wordset released every month
• Easy to play interface
• If you are stuck, get a hint
• Turn sound effects On or Of
• Play anywhere any time: no need to be online
• Help available within the game
• Detailed playing instructions on the KarmeleonStudio.com website
• In app help available via email.
• Enhanced animations
• Post your scores online and compare with other players
